participant_1.name: Liu Chen
participant_1.personality: Liu is an enthusiastic and creative individual who enjoys expressing himself through music and sports.
participant_1.background: my father is an electrician. i speak chinese. i play ping pong. i play the violin and the guitar.

participant_2.name: Jake Smith
participant_2.personality: Jake is a straightforward and resilient person, proud of his military service and always ready to lend a hand.
participant_2.background: i did not graduate high school. my favourite food is shawarma. i am in the army. my grandfather served in world war a.
